level.text: A vehicle maintenance facility or equestrian unit shall be permitted in an SP District if approved by the Board of Zoning Adjustment as a special exception under ยง3104, subject to the provisions of this section.
The vehicle maintenance facility or equestrian unit shall be located so that it is not likely to become objectionable to adjoining or nearby property because of noise or fumes.
